ing: 1/2 cup vegan cream cheese substitute (such as Tofuttiâ„¢)
des: "Thick and creamy, this 100% vegan frosting is delicious on carrot cake and pumpkin breads."
ins: Beat the cream cheese and margarine together with the vanilla extract in a mixing bowl with an electric hand mixer until light. Beat in the soy flour, followed by the confectioners' sugar until light and fluffy. Refrigerate at least 20 minutes before using.
